email_text:
Subject: Urgent: Action Required on Your Netflix Account

Dear valued Netflix customer,

We are writing to inform you that there has been a problem with your billing information and we are unable to process your payment for the next billing cycle. In order to avoid any interruption to your Netflix account, we kindly ask you to verify your billing details as soon as possible.

To verify your billing information, please click on the link provided below and follow the instructions on the secure page:

[Phishing link]

Please note that failure to update your billing information within the next 24 hours may result in a suspension of your Netflix account. We understand the importance of having uninterrupted access to your favorite movies and TV shows, and we want to ensure that you can continue enjoying our services without any disruptions.

Thank you for your prompt attention to this matter. If you have any questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to contact our customer support team.

Sincerely,

The Netflix Team
